results.title: Metformin: new applications for an old drug.
results.text_hl: Another condition that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has been shown to slow the progression of is @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@Duchenne muscular dystrophy@@@.

results.title: Metformin Reverses the Enhanced Myocardial SR/ER-Mitochondria Interaction and Impaired Complex I-Driven Respiration in Dystrophin-Deficient Mice
results.text_hl: Such remodeling could be reversed by @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ providing a novel therapeutic perspective in @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@DMD@@@.

results.title: Upregulation of Wilms' Tumor 1 in epicardial cells increases cardiac fibrosis in dystrophic mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ effectively prevents @DISEASE_Fibrosis @DISEASE_MESH:D005355 @@@cardiac fibrosis@@@ and improves cardiac function in @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@dystrophic@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@, thus representing a treatment option for @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@DMD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ on top of existing therapies.

results.title: Cardio-respiratory and phenotypic rescue of dystrophin/utrophin-deficient mice by combination therapy.
results.text_hl: The DKO @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@ treated with the combination without altering the approved administration protocol of @CHEMICAL_Morpholinos @CHEMICAL_MESH:D060172 @@@PMO@@@ show improved cardio-respiratory and behavioral functions. @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Glycine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005998 @@@glycine@@@ individually are ineffective in @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@DMD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@, but the combination of @CHEMICAL_Morpholinos @CHEMICAL_MESH:D060172 @@@PMO@@@ with clinically-approved oral @CHEMICAL_Glycine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D005998 @@@glycine@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ might improve the efficacy of the treatment also in @<m>DISEASE_Muscular_Dystrophy_Duchenne</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020388 @@@DMD@@@ @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.

citations.NLM: Lin C, Han G, Jia L, Zhao Y, Song J, Ran N, Yokota T, Seow Y, Yin H. Cardio-respiratory and phenotypic rescue of dystrophin/utrophin-deficient mice by combination therapy. EMBO Rep. 2022 Jun 7;23(6):e53955. PMID: 35393769
